casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Ray KING. No. 190P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Michael Ray King, Bunn, for King, Michael Ray. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of September 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
